Post Date: 25 March 2017

First post on the new static site!

I recreated my site that originally used angular and an ajax request to the tumblr api to use a static site generator.

I decided on using the ssg Reptar which uses nunjucks for templates.

Tags: meta ssg reptar nunjucks staticSiteGenerator

back home
